documents.document:
Craps(Translation for the previous chinese)

I opened the photo in the drawer
Thinking of you and me in the past
Our smile was so sweet
But you and my past, slowly fade away as time pass by
Suffocated love
Even there's more tears, its extra
Even though we're not wrong, but sometimes, letting go is the better way to go
Therefore, I kept our love in my mind.

Losing you
Makes everything imbalance
Everything lost its importance
Remembering a dead love
Silent as the night...

When I heard the three words
As if my heart was stabbed
But as time pass by
The sound of a breaking hard seems to be a melody

Showing my both cold hands, even though it can't be touched
But now I only think of getting closer to you
In the sobering wind, the boat that time
Illusions showed me my memories
Unable to forget who is moaning sorrowly
Trying to forget, I can't understand at all
I'm waiting for that floating dream...

I don't think I translated it properly, but, who cares? ^^V. Remember, it's jUz CRAP

EXPRESSION OF MY ANGER!!

A very fine day, as usual, I bought my bus ticket(which allows you to ride the bus whole day).

Very unfortunately, I've accidentally LOST my ticket. Therefore, I was left with no choice but to buy a new ticket, which is RM1. 1 more unfortunate thing is, I have no change at all, only some RM5 notes. There was no other people around me. And then again, i was left with no choice but to go to shops to look for exchanges.

This is the part that ANGERS ME NOW. I went to A LOT OF SHOPS(ALL MALAYS/Chinese). As you can see, a lot of shop means not even 1 shop is willing to change 5 RM1 notes with me. Wtf they thought I was going to con them? For F***'S Sake its only RM5, not RM100, is it really a pain in the ass? But who CARES? I JUZ WANT TO GO HOME!! This really pisses me off, untill I reach a mamak(Indian actually) shop. I juz requested to change. And they straight away changed with me. They even offer me whether to have a drink there or not.

The main thing is, WHY is malaysian SO... Arghh I'm lost of words again, zzZ. My point is, those who looked at this blog, PLEASE, if you have any change, PLEASE change with them(small change of course), DON'T be afraid of people will CON you. Be a CONSIDERATE MALAYSIAN, PLEASE!!

Sigh...

A very simple question to you'all...

Do you all prefer to work under the pressure given by your boss or parents, or working without any pressure at all?

Please do leave some answers and your reasons. Thanks for the comment

What's your aim in your life?

What's your aim in your life? Money? Sex? Love? Family? or whatever there is

Mine is juz simple: Happy family, living my life happily, and be a good person

What about you?

Why do we exist?

Lots of people used to think: We were borned, we grew up, we get old, get sick, and die. What's the point of living then? Or should we say, why do we even exist?

I believe too, alot of people have know the reason why we exist. We exist, to live, a very short short live. But it depends on how we live our life. We live happily, proves that this live is worth living. If we live this precious life full of sadness and sorrow, then why not we just disappear from this universe? We're just polluting this universe.

We live to create things, just like scientists invents stuffs. For non-scientists like us, we live to create happiness, not only for this world, but for our next generation life, so that they can live a better and happier life.

So I've decided, to live happily, not sadly. I have only 1 life, one and only precious life.And I ain't gonna give way to any damn MuthaF***ers ruin my life. Ciaoz~~

Darren~

Deep sigh...

Walking by the streets. Lots of couples, happy couples, everywhere. They can be found everywhere... Somehow happy, but sad. How I've wished for a girlfriend.

I admire those having girlfriends, especially my friends. I feel happy for them, but i feel sorry for myself. Even so, I can do nothing. But, looking at my friend breaking up, just makes me thought that they were silly.

Today, my friend came up to me, and told me that he and his girlfriend broke up. To my surprise, the reason so is because of silly, stupid reasons. I was mad in the inside, but what can I do? They take things so lightly. They thought that relationship was easy to find, but I'm not. When i have a girlfriend, i rather cherish her, give her all the love i can give, everything that makes her happy...

Stress or not? Not sure myself...

Hmm, exam... is such a troublesome thing. Well, what can I do? Its around the corner. For no reason, i feel stressed. But from the way I react, I most probably spend my time slacking. I'm under stress? or I'm just relaxing?

S.A.M exam, ahh yes~ the decisive exam. Juz hope that i still have enough time to study for my trials exam first. OmG there are TONS of syllabus. Anyway to help me concentrate in my studies instead of slacking? 1 week, 1 week, just 1 week, maybe i can pull it through without slacking. I need a COMPANION!! Someone to SUFFER with me!!!!

Courage

Everybody's got to decide for their own future. Everybody has to walk their own path, deciding what to or not to do. A path that will lead them to their future. The poem "Road not Taken", was a very good one. Sometimes when you walked a path, you tend to wonder, you tend to ponder, what the path not taken looks like, what would happen if you had chosen that road. But most important of all, its how you take your first step.

Usually I'm not afraid of things. Big, small, whatever it is, I'm normally not afraid it. Can be said that I'm "fearless", [L]augh [O]ut [L]oud The thing I'm afraid of now, is my future. I can't really tell what my future holds. The more I look at my past, the more I thought of myself, will I ever survive in this modern society? It's all a huge question mark. I fear that, my future is dark. I can be enjoying myself now, but, can i really ensure my future? Can I really decide for my own future? The true fear, is myself. I fear myself of doing things, that my ruin my future.

Hmm, maybe I'm just too young. My friends said that, I'm still young to worry about those things. But, is it really true that I'm not matured enough? I really hoped so. I feel so depressed, down, "emo", every time I thought of this question to myself...

Now the biggest question to myself: Do I have the courage? The courage to take a big step foward?

BBQ

Today seems like a memorable day. Or to be specific, a memorable night

A group of friends, BBQing, chatting, gaming, is just so fun. Even though there aren't any pictures, but I'm so glad that our group organized and participated in it. Even though its just a memory, but its a memory just for us, Taylor's University College S.A.M program, class S5!!

In the end, we just ended our fun with a toast of beers and wine(even though I'm underage). I would hope that we would have another gathering like this another day. Perhaps next year? Or the year after? Well who knows? Time will answer everything

Ignore

In this world, don't we agree that we have lots of troubles and worries? If you don't, I'll have LOADS of doubt. To me, its a total bogus. Well, my main point is, we have too much worries, and unwanted hatred, vengeance, or whatsoever. These emotions, feelings, is what we don't want the most.

During my grandma's funeral, the monk responsible for chanting for her, gave some advice to us, to lead us to a much more happier life.
What he said,"The best solution is to ignore". There's also a self-enrichment book named "How to let go of your bananas". It was very helpful.
In our everyday lives, we have too much unnecessary worries. These worries cause us stress, giving us pressure. To ignore, is totally not thinking about it, to let go of the worries. I've tried this. Ignoring somethings (i.e. i hate this and that person, but i totally ignore him) will relieve your heart, give you some peace of mind.
Besides, we also spend too much time worrying about somethings. Instead of worrying over useless things, why don't we use the time to do something more beneficial?

By: Darren
(Might have some grammar mistakes, do forgive me for my poor english

Expressing anger >(

It was a fine day, well, sort of. I needed to renew my international passport cause i'm going to a trip to Bali soon. Well, that's not a hard thing to do rite? So, my dad fetch me to the immigration center or something, to renew my passport. Normally this takes at most half an hour, but what the fuck? 2 hours? seriously, fuck those departments. First, the chip on my ic, didn't even have a scratch nor rust on it, so it should be fine rite? Yet, the "ic-reader" can't seem to read the data from it. Wtf? Its not the first time. My dad also had the SAME problem twice. And guess what they said. They blamed the chip for not functioning properly. Ok, that's fine. I went to another department to renew. And guess what they said again. They blamed their "ic-reader" for not functioning properly.

Seriously, instead of blaming each other, can't you lousy, good for nothing, lazy assholes do something about it? Oh ya btw, my time is SO much more precious than you fuckers'. Please, begone, ZZZ

??-??

??????
??????

Well, this is one of my favorite day every year. This is when all our family gather back, and eat ??. It's simple, but very fun, seeing my mom's side family, gathering together, chatting, eating. Its warm. This is what i call family .

I just wish that these kind of family gathering won't end forever .

May you all have a happy family gathering too

25 December 2007

Well, its a simple and lame blog.

Wish everyone in pan.nethave a very happy christmas!!

Standing with my own feet now...

For the past... 16 years, I have to admit it, I've been living a good, easy, and relaxing life. Had a maid in the house, doing all the cleaning and all the houseworks. Mum's wonderful cooking every meal... To be honest, I never really stand on my own two feet. I've been hanging on to other people ever since I was born.

And now, its the time I learn how to stand now. Living alone is Australia, seriously, it just makes me regret for not learning how to do my houseworks, cooking and stuffs. Just a sudden change. I'm not sure whether I'll make it or not. It might work out, it might not. There's a WHOLE new environment for me.

big question mark about EVA

Well, i know i'm out-dated, but, just few days ago, i finished watching anime series Neon Genesis Evangelion. And... i don't really get what's going on in the end. WTF was happening? lol~~
If you happen to know about it, mind explaining it to me? thanks xD

Juz a simple survey^^

Lets just say, if, today is your last day of your life, you know you're gonna die...
Question's this: How would you spend that day?

Well, I don't really know how to answer this question, when I was asked. Nothing came to my mind, to be honest

Do reply ^^ thanks~

Happy? Or Sad?

Yay, i got my results for my first sem exam for my first year in uni...
Not satisfying, yet satisfying... yet happy, yet sad.
Why is it so wierd?
